events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report detailing the vehicle damage sustained.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle and oversee the processing of the customer's auto accident claim.
Confirmation sent to the customer acknowledging the receipt and registration of their auto accident claim.
Requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and driver’s license for claim verification.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed pictures of the damaged vehicle and the official police report.
The claims investigation team started reviewing submitted evidence to determine cause and liability of the auto accident.
Investigation completed successfully with clear determination that the customer’s vehicle was not at fault in the collision.
Based on investigation results, a comprehensive settlement offer has been proposed covering all repair costs for the vehicle.
Customer has responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and claim handling process.
Approval granted for the claim settlement, authorizing payment release for vehicle repairs as per the offer.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s account promptly to cover all repair expenses.
The claim has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs are underway.
